Uses of Class
org.barghos.core.color.LDRColor3

  • Packages that use LDRColor3 
    Package Description
    org.barghos.core.color
    This package contains all basic implementations of LDR/HDR RGB/RGBA colors.
    org.barghos.core.pool.color
    This package contains pools for colors.

      Returns an instance of LDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to r, g and b.

      Returns an instance of LDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to the values of t.
